member.name: XAPO_LOCKFORPROCESS_PARAMETERS
member.summary: Defines stream buffer parameters that remain constant while an XAPO is locked. Used with the IXAPO::LockForProcess method.
member.remarks: The byte size of the respective stream buffer must be at least MaxFrameCount Ã— (pFormat-nBlockAlign) bytes.

member.name: XAPO_LOCKFORPROCESS_PARAMETERS.pFormat
member.summary: A WAVFORMATEX describing the format for the stream buffer.

member.name: XAPO_LOCKFORPROCESS_PARAMETERS.MaxFrameCount
member.summary: Maximum number of frames in the stream buffer that IXAPO::Process would ever be required to handle, irrespective of dynamic parameter settings.
